greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(n+1) = (a(n) + n) mod 10.
comment: First row of array shown below.
a(n) = most significant digit of A062273(n).
formula: a(n) = A000124(n) mod 10. - _Peter M. Chema_, Feb 11 2017
mathematica: a = {1}; Do[AppendTo[a, Mod[a[[n - 1]] + n - 1, 10]], {n, 2, 120}]; a (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 13 2017 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 06 2001
ext: Better description and more terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 08 2001
